subject: Re: My first Ghost Box Reply Recorded & Needed Audobe Audition ...
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Nice idea...

You can purchase those custom computer cases that have neon glow tubes 
in them, etc.  Mount the hardware inside, apply some slick graphics and 
you're stylin', Frank!  

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Marlboro63@... wrote:
>
> Hey Frank,
>  
> A box you can see at night, what a novel thought.  Ever thought of  
putting 
> your electronics in a glow in  the dark case?  Maybe even make  them 
> multi-colored?  Now that would be something different.
>  
> Jeff
